name: Aquaactress Salmon
text:
2 Aqua Monsters
Cannot be used as Link Material. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send any number of "Aquarium" cards from your side of the field to the GY; Special Summon that many "Aquaactress" monsters from your Deck. Once per turn: you can send any number of "Aquarium" cards from the field to the GY; Activate that many "Aquarium" Spells from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you Summon this card except "Aquaactress" monsters.
